name: Haunted Hill
description:
Haunted Hill is a 1-player arcade game for the TRS-80.

The controls a small character on the bottom of the screen whom moves laterally, and tries to shoot ghosts that move towards the bottom of the screen. Ghosts move horizontally until they reach a barricade, at which point they move down one level and continue to move. The field if full of tombstones. A shot ghost becomes a tombstone. When a tombstone is destroyed, it becomes a larger ghost that flies about the screen until it is shot. If the player is hit by any ghost, they lose a life, and the level restarts.

The player can chose to start with 3 or 5 lives, and there is a fast and slow gameplay mode.
